guideline.name: Annotation of FDA Label for hydroxychloroquine and G6PD

text.html: "Hemolytic Anemia Associated with G6PD Deficiency: Hemolysis has been reported in patients with glucose-6-phosphate dehydrogenase (G6PD) deficiency. Monitor for hemolytic anemia as this can occur, particularly in association with other drugs that cause hemolysis." See label for more information.
